entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
